resources.string:
• Please power on your {device_name}s by plugging them in.

 • All indicator lights should blink {indicator_light_setup_color_name}. If a {device_name} has been set up before, hold the {setup_button_identifier} for 3 seconds to set up again.

 • Make sure your Android device is connected to the internet.

 • Tap the READY button to proceed.
